description: This file defines the ReplicateTools class, which integrates with the replicate API to generate media (images or videos) based on prompts. It includes methods for initializing the tool, generating media, and parsing outputs to identify media types and add artifacts to agents or teams.

classes.name: ReplicateTools
classes.description: A toolkit class that interfaces with the replicate API to generate media content based on prompts, and adds the generated media as artifacts to agents or teams.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the ReplicateTools with optional API key, model, and other parameters, and sets up the tools list.

methods.name: generate_media
methods.description: Generates media (image or video) from a prompt using the replicate model, and returns the URI of the generated media.

methods.name: _parse_output
methods.description: Parses the output from replicate to determine media type based on file extension, adds the media artifact to the agent, and returns a success message.
